text: Bigū ej Pajomʙar, ʙaroi inho muşrikon: «Ojo az in şarikone, ki şumo ʙa Alloh şarik soxtaed, kase hast, ki ʙa haq roh namojad?» Bigū ʙarojaşon: «Alloh gumrohro ʙa haq roh menamojad. Ojo on Zote, ki ʙa haq roh menamojad ʙa pajravī sazovortar ast jo on kase, ki ʙa haq roh namejoʙad, magar in ki ʙa haq hidojat karda şavad? Pas şumoro cī şudaast? cī guna hukm mekuned?»
